description: This is the main app widget file for a Flutter application named Bhakti Calendar. It defines the root widget, manages navigation among different pages such as HomePage, CalendarPage, VratPage, MantraPage, and QuizPage, and includes UI components like AppBar, BottomNavigationBar, and a settings modal sheet.

classes.name: BhaktiCalendarApp
classes.description: Root StatefulWidget for the Bhakti Calendar app, manages navigation state.

classes.name: _BhaktiCalendarAppState
classes.description: State class for BhaktiCalendarApp, handles UI build and navigation logic.

methods.name: _onTab
methods.description: Updates the current page index when a navigation tab is selected.

methods.name: _titleForIndex
methods.description: Returns the app bar title based on the current index.
